body_html: I was attempting to use add_check_numerics_ops for debugging purposes. One of the models I was building was spitting out NaNs and I wanted to figure out where they were coming from. Ideally I'd like it to check within the while loop too, but that doesn't seem to work.
body_text: I was attempting to use add_check_numerics_ops for debugging purposes. One of the models I was building was spitting out NaNs and I wanted to figure out where they were coming from. Ideally I'd like it to check within the while loop too, but that doesn't seem to work.
body: I was attempting to use add_check_numerics_ops for debugging purposes. One of the models I was building was spitting out NaNs and I wanted to figure out where they were coming from. Ideally I'd like it to check within the while loop too, but that doesn't seem to work.
